other_tests.findings: Marked slowing and absence of evoked response of both motor and sensory nerves (median motor conduction velocity of 21 m/sec; ulnar motor conduction velocity of 19 m/sec; peroneal motor nerve not evoked; median sensory and sural nerve, evoked responses absent).
Fasciculation potentials, giant potentials, and reduced recruitment pattern of motor unit potentials found in the gastrocnemius muscles.
Increased protein levels (Patient 1: 114 mg/dL; Patient 2: 73 mg/dL; Patient 3: 110 mg/dL).
No linkage to MPZ, PMP22, Cx32, or EGR2 genes. Possible linkage to chromosome 11q23 suggested.
